name: Captain America
summary: Adventurer, federal official, intelligence operative; former soldier, Hydra agent, liaison between S.H.I.E.L.D. and the Avengers, police officer, teacher, sparring partner. Group affiliation: Secret Avengers (Black OPS Unit Formerly,The Avengers, Secret Avengers (Civil War), New Avengers, formerly The Invaders, Secret Defenders The Redeemers; formerly partner of Bucky, Golden Girl, Rick Jones, Falcon, Demolition-Man and Nomad (Jack Monroe)

name: Black Panther
summary: King and Chieftain of Wakanda, scientist; former school teacher. Group affiliation: Formerly Fantastic Four, Secret Avengers, Avengers, Pendragons, Queen's Vengeance, former Fantastic Force financier

name: Black Widow
summary: Adventurer, Intelligence agent, former ballerina. Group affiliation: Secret Avengers; formerly Thunderbolts (as Yelena Belova), Nick Fury, Mighty Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D., Avengers, Champions of Los Angeles, Lady Liberators, KGB, Marvel Knights, partner of Daredevil, Hawkeye, Boris Turgenov, Logan

name: Doctor Strange
summary: Sorcerer Supreme, retired neurosurgeon. Group affiliation: Defenders, underground Avengers; formerly the Order, Midnight Sons; former disciple of the Ancient One

name: Gamora
summary: Assassin, mercenary, adventurer. Group affiliation: Guardians of the Galaxy ; formerly Phalanx's Selects, Graces (Leader), Infinity Watch ; United Front ; former minion of Thanos; ally of Adam Warlock and Pip the Troll

name: Hulk
summary: Nuclear physicist, Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. Group affiliation: Defenders, former leader of the new Hulkbusters, member of the Avengers, Pantheon, Titans Three, the Order, Hulkbusters of Counter-Earth-Franklin, alternate Fantastic Four

name: Iron Man
summary: Inventor, Industrialist; former United States Secretary of Defense. Group affiliation: Avengers, Illuminati, Stark Resilient; formerly S.H.I.E.L.D., leader of Stark Enterprises, the Pro-Registration Superhero Unit, New Avengers, Mighty Avengers, Hellfire Club, Force Works, Avengers West Coast, United States Department of Defense.

name: Captain Marvel
summary: Former National Aeronautics and Space Administration security Chief, former magazine editor, former freelance writer, former military intelligence officer. Group affiliation: Marvel Family, Justice Society of America currently Avengers, former companion to the X-Men (as Carol Danvers), former member of the Starjammers (as Binary), Former Avenger (as Ms. Marvel)

name: Spider-Man
summary: Freelance photographer, teacher. Group affiliation: Member of the Avengers, formerly member of Outlaws, alternate Fantastic Four

name: Thor
summary: King of Asgard; formerly EMS Technician; Physician. Group affiliation: Avengers
